data.system_settings: Windows Home SL 1803 x64 using Asus Precision Touchpad
data.expected_result: scrolling with precision touchpads is just fine
data.short_description: precision touchpad scroll gesture delays scrolling with discord
data.steps_to_repro: - be sure that you have precision touchpad in your laptop. idk if it works on legacy touchpads as well. - scroll by swiping up and down with two finger gesture. observe
